name: October End of the Era
description:
[October End of the Era]

Game made by Fable Bae

Sound Design by Jenna Salgado

Requirements:

Twitch Username

Twitch Channel name (which chat to read commands from)

Twitch OAuth Token (get OAuth token here: https://twitchapps.com/tmi/)

Type !help in Twitch chat to start game.

For further questions, direct it to @rudfkr0316 on twitter or mbae44@gmail.com

I made this game in about 3 days?

So please forgive me for my crude writing and bugs lol
